title: BUSINESS - CONTROLS RECONCILIATION INTEGRITY (ATLAS PART)
time_sequence: GD - DATA RECONCILIATION AND TRANSMISSION TO SATELLITES (P&C)

task_list.instruction_title:
Execute controls the below controls and send results to TORONTOMigrationCoordination:

High Priority
C1013 - Liste des dépositaires mappés non existant dans ATLAS 
K1011 - Liste des dépositaires en status Dummy 
K1006 - Nb multi-currency positions
K1004 - Liste des instruments en position, absent du référentiel ATLAS
K1003 - Liste des instruments en position, absent du référentiel TORONTO 
C1000 - Asset Repartition by client 
K1012 - Liste des comptes G Non mappés 
C1750B - Comparatif entre le fichier des estimatifs et fichier des positions des securities 
C1243B - Tech. pre-check, Integrity of all tables (Stat)
C1243 - Tech. pre-check, Integrity of all tables 
C1099 - Assets received by company
C1019 - Breakdown count of lines per received files 
C1018 - List of banks without assets
C1017 - List of customers migrated without any assets 
C1012 - Liste des comptes de migration à créer obligatoirement 
C1008 - List of duplicate cash positions received 
C1005A - List of duplicate keys (Client + Cash Account) in TORONTO files  
C1004 A - Details of customers closed with Asset 
C1006 A - Asset Repartition by currency

Low Priority
C1006 - Asset Repartition
K1001 - Nb clients multi-portefeuilles 
C1750 - Comparatif entre le fichier des estimatifs et tous les autres fichiers
C1004 - Customer Scope Analysis (Secli Only) 
C1004 - Customer scope analysis with asset details 
C1004 - Customer Scope Analysis
C1003 - Detail of Dummies in DICO tables 
C1002 - Dummies account in DICO tables
C1001 - File volume check before engine integration 
C1021 - List of Client detailled by Asset Manager 
C1020 - List of Asset Manager with & without CLients 
C1099 - Asset Repartition not identified / not mapped
